jp_text: {\fad(600,400)\blur6}本字幕由诸神字幕组出品，仅供学习交流
google_translated: This writer Yui Kamijinji exhibition, 仅 学 学 交 交

en_text: It's a symbol of our friendship. Here, it's yours!
You don't need them anymore, right?
Since you won't give me anything.
jp_text: {\blur2}だってお前はおれに何もくれないんだから
google_translated: Because  I can not give anything to you

en_text: stop pissing me off so much?
jp_text: {\blur2}おれをあまりイラつかせないでよね
{\blur2}おれがアダムになるまではね
{\blur2}ううん　そういうわけじゃ…

en_text: Kou is at work right now.
No, I was just wondering where he is, \Nsince I haven't seen him around.
jp_text: {\blur2}ううん　いないからどうしたのかなぁって思っただけ
google_translated: I'm sorry because I didn't think

en_text: Come with me to my room.
jp_text: {\blur2}ちょっとおれの部屋に来て
{\blur2}おれボタン苦手なんだよね
google_translated: I'm not good at a button

en_text: What kind of work is it?

jp_text: {\blur2}アイドルやってるんだ　おれ

en_text: Then let me tell you a fairy tale.
jp_text: {\blur2}それじゃ　おとぎ話をしてあげる

en_text: It's about a boy who was alone since birth.
jp_text: {\blur2}生まれた時から一人ぼっちだった少年の話
google_translated: The story of a boy who was alone since I was born

en_text: Having never seen the outside world, \Nthere was one thing the boy longed for.
jp_text: {\blur2}外の世界を知らない少年には　ずっと憧れている物がありました
google_translated: There was a thing that has been longing for a boy who does not know the world outside

en_text: It was the small, round sky \Nvisible from the manhole.
jp_text: {\blur2}それはマンホールから見える　小さくて丸い空
google_translated: It is a small round sky that can be seen from manhole

en_text: He longed to obtain that \Nbright, beautiful sky.
jp_text: {\blur2}その明るく綺麗な空を自由に掴むことです
google_translated: It is to grasp the bright and beautiful sky freely

en_text: He thought his dream would come \Ntrue if he could just get outside.
jp_text: {\blur2}彼は外に出ればそれは叶うと思っていました
google_translated: I thought that if he went out of it

en_text: Then suddenly, one day, \Nthe boy was able to get out.
jp_text: {\blur2}そしてある日突然　少年は外に出ることができたのです
google_translated: and one day suddenly the boy could go out

en_text: However, he was taken to \Na certain institution.
jp_text: {\blur2}ですが連れてこられたのは　ある施設でした
google_translated: It was , but it was a facility that could be taken

en_text: The place was full of children with \Nno place to go, just like the boy.
jp_text: {\blur2}そこには　その少年のように行き場のない子供がたくさんいて
google_translated: There are a lot of children without going to go there like that boy

en_text: There, a world more terrifying than \Nthe sewers was waiting for the boy.
jp_text: {\blur2}マンホールの下よりもっとひどい世界が待っていました
google_translated: The worst world was waiting for more than the manhole

en_text: The boy was more beautiful \Nthan the other children,
jp_text: {\blur2}他の子より美しかった少年は

en_text: so he was given nice clothes and fed good food.
jp_text: {\blur2}綺麗な服と美味しいご飯を与えられました
{\blur2}人以下の扱いを受けたのです

en_text: There are some who think imperfection \Nmakes a thing all the more beautiful.
jp_text: {\blur2}不完全なものほど美しいって思う人がいるんだってさ
google_translated: There is a person who thinks that it is so beautiful as it is incomplete

en_text: Why are you making that face?
jp_text: {\blur2}何できみが　そんな顔するの

en_text: How can you speak so cheerfully \Nabout something so painful?
jp_text: {\blur2}そんな辛いこと　どうして明るく話せるの

en_text: It's where I met Ruki-kun and the others.
jp_text: {\blur2}そこでルキくんたちと出会ったんだ

en_text: You cannot obtain anything \Nwithout paying the price.
jp_text: {\blur2}何の代償もなしに得られる物はない
google_translated: There is no thing that can be obtained without the price

en_text: That's how the world works. Now, come here.
jp_text: {\blur2}さぁ　こっちに来なさい

google_translated: It is a really beautiful face

en_text: Why don't you give me your everything?
jp_text: {\blur2}どうして喜ばないの　おれのプレゼントを
google_translated: Why don't you please give me a gift

en_text: Nothing in this world comes free.
jp_text: {\blur2}代償のない取引はこの世に存在しないのに
google_translated: Versible transactions do not exist in this world

en_text: If you don't know, I'll teach you.
jp_text: {\blur2}分からないなら教えてあげるよ
google_translated: I will tell you if I do not know
